Payload:

Parameter Type Position # Description
title string body Required kind name.
description string body Required about kind.
is_active boolean body Required boolean value that shows active or not active.
days_stay positivesmallinteger body Required period of stay.
days_valid positivesmallinteger body Required period of visa valid.
fee_person positivesmallinteger body Required fee of visa per person.
entry_kind int body Required Id of entry kind.
documents list body Required List of document id for visa kind.
visa_exempt_country list body Required List of country id for visa kind.
fee_exempt_country list body Required List of country id for visa kind.
discount_list list body Required List of discounts id for visa kind. 

    {
        'title': 'title updated',
        'description': "description updated",
        'is_active': False,
        'days_stay': 1,
        'days_valid': 1,
        'entry_kind': 1,
        'fee_person': 1,
        'documents': [
            1,
        ],
        'visa_exempt_country': [ 1 , 2 , 3 ],
        'fee_exempt_country': [ 1 , 2 , 3 ],
        'discount_list': [
            {
                'num_person': 10,
                'percent': 0.25,
            },
            {
                'num_person': 15,
                'percent': 0.5,

            },
        ]
    }
{% endblock request %} {% block response %}
